resources.string: We request lock permission to guarantee you are the owner of this device.\n We will lock the screen and ask you to unlock it using your default lock method (password, pattern .. etc), when you unlock the screen you can continue setup SaveMe on your device.
We Request Lock Permission To Guarantee You Are The Owner Of This Device

1- Choose which apps you want to enable it for others -all apps will be disabled at the beginning-.
2- Click on the lock button {1} to enter the protected mode.
3- Now you will just see allowed apps and no one can run any other apps that you are not allowed it.
4- To close protexted mode click on unlock button {2}.
Please choose your preferred lock method, You will need this to move form Restricted Mode to Full Access mode.\nNote: this lock private to SaveMe app and not the device lock.
